title: Market share of soft drink companies in South Africa 2010
summary: The statistic shows the share of global South Africa unit shipments by vendor in 2010 .
PepsiCo_Inc 's share of South Africa shipments South stood at 49.8 % in 2010 .
gold: The statistic shows the market share of soft drink companies in South Africa in 2010 , based on sales value.
In that year , Coca Cola 's market share in South Africa amounted to 49.8 percent.
The leading 3 soft drink companies in South Africa had a market share of 64.7 percent .
